page.title: 07EDUCATION IN AMMANFORD
page.content: There are several schools in the study area of the Amman Valley. The number of pupils at each school is as follows:- Saron 130, Tycroes 160, Parcyrhun 130, Ammanford Junior 220, Walter Road Infants 170, Betws 80, Ysgol Gymraeg Rhydaman 120 . Nearly all these pupils, above the age of eleven, will attend the Amman Valley Comprehensive school. Ysgol Gymraeg Rhydaman is the only Welsh medium school, although Welsh lessons are offered in all the named primary schools. The Technical College, found in Ammanford, has 300 full time and 530 part time students. A very wide range of study subjects is offered, the most popular being the Secretarial, Caring and Construction courses. The A.V.C.S. and the Technical College jointly run courses on a "Day-release" system.
